target.topic: Ukrainian troop presence on Russian soil
references: presence of Ukrainian troops on Russian soil

justifications: Vladimir Putin's regime has launched a propaganda campaign describing the presence of Ukrainian troops on Russian soil as the 'new normal'.
The Kremlin's messaging is directed at the local Russian population and suggests that Moscow expects the surprise occupation of its territory to last for months.
The Russian government has been trying to downplay the significance of the incursion.

target.topic: Military gains in the Kursk region
references: expands its military gains in the Kursk region
surprise incursion into Russia's Kursk region

justifications: Early this month, Ukrainian forces made a surprise incursion into Russia's Kursk region from where Russia has been forced to evacuate more than 130,000 people.
As Ukraine expands its military gains in the Kursk region, the Russian government has been trying to downplay the significance of the incursion.
